meanings.definition: To tell a story in a particular way to influence opinion.
meanings.sent1: The politician spins the facts to gain support.
meanings.sent2: She spins a tale of adventure to captivate her audience.
meanings.sent3: The author spins a yarn that keeps readers guessing.
meanings.sent4: His clever use of words spins a convincing narrative.
meanings.sent5: The marketing team spins the product's benefits to attract customers.
